sentences.sContent: Fine dust in the nebula reflects the light.
sentences.sContent_eng: Fine dust in the nebula reflects the light.
sentences.sCn: 星云中细致的尘埃反射了星光。

sentences.sContent: As the nebula collapsed because of its gravity, it spun faster and flattened into a disk.
sentences.sContent_eng: As the nebula collapsed because of its gravity, it spun faster and flattened into a disk.
sentences.sCn: 随着由于重力引起的星云坍缩，它旋转得越来越快，并变成了盘状。

sentences.sContent: In fact, clumps of dust and molecular gas collapsing to form stars may well lurk within the dark nebula, a structure that spans almost 40 light-years across the gorgeous telescopic view.
sentences.sContent_eng: In fact, clumps of dust and molecular gas collapsing to form stars may well lurk within the dark nebula, a structure that spans almost 40 light-years across the gorgeous telescopic view.
sentences.sCn: 事实上，暗星云中很可能隐藏有分子气体和尘埃丛坍缩形成恒星，漂亮的望远镜视野中的这个结构宽几乎40光年。

words.tran: 朦胧的；星云的，星云状的

trans.tranOther: a mass of gas and dust among the stars, which often appears as a bright cloud in the sky at night
